meanings.definition: The upper house of the United States Congress.
meanings.sent1: The senate meets to discuss important laws.
meanings.sent2: The senate passed a new bill yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The senate members had a pizza party after a long debate.
meanings.sent4: In the senate of democracy, voices echo for the people.
meanings.sent5: The grand senate chamber echoed with the sound of democracy.

meanings.definition: A legislative body in certain countries.
meanings.sent1: The country's senate gathers to make decisions.
meanings.sent2: The senate debates the budget every year.
meanings.sent3: The senate members wore funny hats during the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The senate is the heart of the nation's decision-making.
meanings.sent5: The historic senate building stood tall, a symbol of power.

meanings.definition: A council of citizens in ancient Rome.
meanings.sent1: The ancient Roman senate advised the rulers.
meanings.sent2: In ancient Rome, the senate held great influence.
meanings.sent3: The Roman senate had to deal with mischievous pigeons in their meetings.
meanings.sent4: The senate of Rome stood as a pillar of wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The marble walls of the Roman senate whispered tales of the past.
